pages.text: Once you have a $(l:bloodmagic:altar/blood_altar)Blood Altar$(), you'll need to gather a few $(item)Demon Wills$(). There are two ways to get Demon Will:$(br)$(li)Killing a mob that has been hit with a $(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/will_manipulation/soul_snare)Soul Snare$(/l) and is killed when white particle effects appear.$(li)By killing a hostile mob with a $(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/demonic_items/sentient_sword)Sentient Sword$().$(br)Since you are just beginning to use the mod, you will not yet have a $(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/demonic_items/sentient_sword)Sentient Sword$(),

and thus will need to use a $(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/will_manipulation/soul_snare)Soul Snare$(). $(br2)$(item)Demon Will$() is a recurring resource in $(blood)Blood Magic$(), and is used to power the $(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/will_manipulation/soul_forge)Hellfire Forge$(). $(br2)In the lore of $(blood)Blood Magic$(), $(raw)Demon Will$() is the residual effect of when a demon imbues its will into the bodies of the dead or other monsters.

Once you have some $(raw)Will$(), you can use it to craft useful tools in the $(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/will_manipulation/soul_forge)Hellfire Forge$(). If you find them cluttering up your inventory, perhaps a $(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/will_manipulation/soul_gem)Tartaric Gem$() may help.
